snippet.title: Stanley Cup tour blog
snippet.description: and the Cup. All told he stopped for maybe two minutes, but he made the day for dozens of people. \-- Dan Rosen Cup visit to Falls is highlight of one career 08.13.10 / 9:58 AM ET Angela Berti is the spokesperson from the New York State Parks who arranged the entire stay here at Niagara Falls. She had walk throughs at the Falls with Kane's dad and then a separate one with his mom. She spent several days...
